name: m365-tic-tac-toe-game-prompt
title: Play Tic-Tac-Toe game
shortDescription: This Tic-Tac-Toe Game prompt is designed to let you play the classic game interactively with Copilot.
longDescription: This Tic-Tac-Toe Game prompt is designed to let you play the classic game interactively with Copilot. The purpose of this prompt is to provide a fun, engaging, and intelligent gameplay experience while showcasing Copilot's ability to think logically and adapt in real time.
